news.title: AI Sam Altman and the Sora copyright gamble: 'I hope Nintendo doesn't sue us'
news.summary: CNBC has seen videos of characters from shows like "SpongeBob SquarePants" on the platform. CNBC was able to independently generate other characters.

news.title: Warren Buffett Watch: His last big deal as Berkshire CEO before Abel takes over?
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway has a deal to pay $9.7 billion in cash to buy OxyChem. OxyChem is Occidental Petroleum's chemical business.

news.title: The shutdown meant no jobs report. Here's what it would have said about the economy
news.summary: Other reports suggest the labor market just plodded along in September. While the BLS has gone dark with the shutdown, other reports suggest it was a good month.

news.title: Inside the uranium plant at the center of U.S. plans to expand nuclear power
news.summary: Urenco operates the only uranium enrichment plant in the U.S. It is boosting production as the United States bans Russian fuel at the same time nuclear demand grows.

news.title: Activist Irenic builds a stake in Workiva, hoping to gain a voice on the software company's board
news.summary: Activist investor is calling on Workiva to review strategic alternatives and refresh its board. The company has been posting losses for years. Workiva says it is reviewing its strategic alternatives.

news.title: ‘He thinks nothing of spending $40K on a new car’: My husband gives me the silent treatment. How can we agree on finances?
news.summary: “I’m looking for a financial planner, marriage counselor and, possibly, a divorce attorney,” the woman says.

news.title: Are we in a recession? Yes — if you live in one of these 22 states.
news.summary: The U.S. economy is very close to falling into a damaging contraction. Many states are already in a recession, says Mark Zandi, chief economist at Moody’s Analytics.

news.title: Think AI is a bubble? Here’s what you can do about it.
news.summary: The “easy money’ in the AI trade has already been made. These three strategies can help you protect your portfolio and reduce risk.

news.title: How to make money from tax-loss selling between now and the end of the year
news.summary: The biggest year-to-date losers will likely fall even more in coming weeks — and become good bounce-back candidates. The biggest losers in the U.S. stock market have lost more than $1 billion this year.

news.title: This stock and bond strategy is so disliked — and it’s probably your best investment move for the next 10 years
news.summary: In the past, when the market was overvalued as it is now, a 60/40 portfolio almost always beat the S&P 500 over the subsequent decade.
